cause.description:
Together SAHF and FUSAL promote health, nutrition, education, and community and human development programs aimed at improving the quality of life of the most impoverished Salvadorans.
Since its inception in 1983, SAHF has distributed nearly $400 million in aid to more than 550 health-related programs and institutions throughout El Salvador and mobilized the goodwill, social responsibility and generosity of its supporters worldwide to enable its cause.
SAHF is a registered 501 (c)(3), US based foundation.
Photograph by: Carlos Escobar (Madanapale)
1. 25 % of children under the age of 5 in El Salvador's rural areas are malnourished! Help us eradicate it with our LIBRAS DE AMOR program.
2. Helping El Salvador step by step since 1983.
3. Your sympathy is appreciated, but your donation goes further...
cause.mission: To enhance the wellbeing of the underserved people of El Salvador through human development programs implemented by our partner foundation, FUSAL, and other organization.
cause.name: Salvadoran American Humanitarian Foundation (SAHF)
